SEARCH
Package ru.nsu.gaskov.core

Class Hand

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.gaskov.core.Hand
public class Hand extends Object
The Hand class represents a player's hand in a blackjack game, managing the cards, betting, and game rules related to the hand.

  • Method Details

    • isSplit

      public boolean isSplit()
      Checks if the hand is split into two piles.
      Returns:
      true if the hand is split, false otherwise

    • setBet

      public void setBet(int bet)
      Sets the bet amount for the hand.
      Parameters:
      bet - the amount to set as the bet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the bet is less than 0

    • getBet

      public int getBet()
      Retrieves the current bet amount.
      Returns:
      the current bet amount

    • insure

      public void insure()
      Insures the hand, marking it as insured.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the hand is already insured

    • setDoubled

      public void setDoubled()
      Marks the hand as doubled.

    • isInsured

      public boolean isInsured()
      Checks if the hand is insured.
      Returns:
      true if the hand is insured, false otherwise

    • isDoubled

      public boolean isDoubled()
      Checks if the hand is doubled.
      Returns:
      true if the hand is doubled, false otherwise

    • getCards1

      public List<Card> getCards1()
      Retrieves the primary cards in the hand.
      Returns:
      a list of primary Card objects

    • getCards2

      public List<Card> getCards2()
      Retrieves the secondary cards in the hand (if split).
      Returns:
      a list of secondary Card objects or null if not split

    • getCards1Value

      public int getCards1Value()
      Calculates and retrieves the total value of the primary cards.
      Returns:
      the total value of cards in cards1

    • getCards2Value

      public int getCards2Value()
      Calculates and retrieves the total value of the secondary cards.
      Returns:
      the total value of cards in cards2
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if cards2 is null (hand is not split)

    • getCurrentPileValue

      public int getCurrentPileValue()
      Gets the current total value of the active card pile in the hand.
      Returns:
      the value of the current cards pile

    • isHandSplittable

      public boolean isHandSplittable()
      Checks if the hand can be split.
      Returns:
      true if the hand is splittable, false otherwise

    • split

      public void split(Card card1, Card card2)
      Splits the hand into two separate piles of cards.
      Parameters:
      card1 - the first card for the new pile
      card2 - the second card for the new pile
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the hand cannot be split

    • take

      public void take(Card card)
      Adds a card to the current pile of cards.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the maximum value of the hand is reached

    • getCurrentCardsPile

      public int getCurrentCardsPile()
      Gets the current cards pile indicator (0 or 1).
      Returns:
      the current cards pile (0 for cards1, 1 for cards2)

    • changePile

      public void changePile()
      Changes the active cards pile to the other pile (if split).
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the hand is not split or if the pile is already changed
